name: Chimera, Royal
description: The Royal Chimera features elements from various creatures, including a ferocious lion's head, a goat's head that can cast spells, and a dragon's head capable of exhaling fire.
memorable: Its ability to blend physical might with powerful spellcasting makes it a versatile threat in combat.
goals: To dominate and intimidate its opponents and allies with powerful abilities.
relations: Often encountered in the company of other evil creatures or as a mythical guardian.
environment: Typically found in dark, remote areas, often guarding treasures or territory.
strengths: Resistant to nonmagical attacks, immune to charmed and frightened conditions, and capable of dealing both physical and magical damage.
weaknesses: Lower intelligence limits strategic capabilities and access to certain magical spells.
attacks: Utilizes a combination of physical attacks like Bite and Claws, along with powerful magical attacks like Arcane Blast and Searing Breath.
most_powerful_ability: Searing Breath allows a sweeping fiery attack that can blind opponents and deal massive damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight within 30 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings in total darkness and invisibility.
skills: Has a moderate passive perception of 16.
additional_information: Can use Legendary Resistance to avoid failed saves.
Roar of the King provides temporary hit points to nearby allies.
Spellcasting capability adds versatility in combat.
Regal Bearing enhances its defensive capabilities.
The mix of physical and magical attacks offers strategic options.
spellcasting: Can cast spells using Charisma, including charm person, dispel magic, and dominate person.
test_queries: huge monster that flies and casts spells
versatile chimera that resists nonmagical attacks
formidable beast with magical fire attacks
